original_text: He was thirty-two years old when he became king, and he reigned eight years in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 여호람이 왕이 될 때에 나이가 삼십이 세라 예루살렘에서 팔 년 동안 통치하니라

sentences.original_text: He was thirty-two years old when he became king
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 왕이 되었을 때 서른두 살이었다

sentences.original_text: and he reigned eight years in Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 예루살렘에서 팔년 동안 통치했다
